channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenKM -- OpenKM Document Management Community
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenKM -- OpenKM Document Management Community

item.title: CVE-2022-2131|2024-09-17T01:10:51.016Z -- openkm -- openkm%20document%20management%20community
item.description: OpenKM Community Edition in its 6.3.10 version and before was using XMLReader parser in XMLTextExtractor.java file without the required security flags, allowing an attacker to perform a XML external entity injection attack.
